overview: Three women of different ages and backgrounds meet in the waiting room of an ophthalmologistâ€™s office. Overhearing the conversation of the two older women, the young woman Sasha learns of the tragedy they experienced in the war. The indifference she felt towards them until that moment is replaced by a sense of closeness and connection. However, the chance to share this is irreversibly lost.
title: Belladonna
